Cat on the Signal

Off-kilter bedroom pop meets chillhop minimalism. Lo-fi textures pulse gently with analog fuzz, layered beneath soft jazzy chords and sputtering vinyl crackles. Bass loops twist just off-tempo, giving the track a living, unstable rhythm. Vocals, if present, are hushed and syrupy, hiding under reverbed pads and tape flutter. It’s a dreamy feedback loop—warm, weird, and weightless.

  • Album: Available Now
  • Genre: bedroom pop, chillhop, lo-fi
  • Mood:
  • Duration: 2:45
